title: Let The Machines Do The Work - Bots & Cryptocurrency Future
author: marsresident / Van Kush Family
overview: Vision for bot-based smartphone apps that earn cryptocurrency, make bots accessible to everyone, and transform what it means to own a smartphone

core_prediction.timeline: Within a few years according to entire Tech community

types_of_bots.captcha_context: Are you a robot? / Prove you are not a robot

bazillion_beings.mission: Making bots available to everyone in unprecedented way

app_concept.hosts_bots: App that hosts bots - no need to know specific bot exists
app_concept.no_viruses: Safe environment, no worry about malware
app_concept.easy_access: Just use app store and click things

bot_capabilities: Find people you might want to meet
Learn about you and get smarter
Suggest places based on actual menus and preferences

bot_ecosystem.learning: As bot learns about you, it gets smarter
bot_ecosystem.sharing: Other people can download your bot
bot_ecosystem.mixing: Download others' bots and mix best features
bot_ecosystem.release: Release new bot for others to download
bot_ecosystem.earnings: Earn money on bots created from your bot by others

first_time_ever: Someone who hardly knows how to use computer can pick up phone, download app, pick bot, earn money
With few clicks, create new bot and release to world
Share on Facebook and Twitter for non-technical users
Non-technical people can use AND create bots and earn money
revolutionary_aspects.paradigm_shift: Not starting inside Bitcoin world trying to reach out - starting OUTSIDE crypto reaching in
revolutionary_aspects.google_coin_analogy: If Google created Google coin, more popular than Bitcoin because reaches past Bitcoin community

traditional_mining.POW: Proof of Work - complex math problems (Blocks) solved by computers/ASICs
traditional_mining.POS: Proof of Stake - coins in wallet automatically mine
traditional_mining.distribution: Most coins distribute 100% through these methods

bazillion_model.difference: Percentage of coin goes to Bots and their creators/users
bazillion_model.earning: Use or create bots = earn coins like someone mining

cash_out_process.step_1: Trade coins for Bitcoin on Bittrex or C-Cex
cash_out_process.step_2: Turn Bitcoin to cash on Coinbase

blocks_explained.creation: Blocks created by transactions (e.g., I send you a coin)
blocks_explained.solving: As Blocks solved, transaction goes through
blocks_explained.reward: Person/pool who solved Block gets paid = new coins generated

ngo_cryptocurrency_vision.fundraising_model: Same way Steemit works - no one actually gives money, but money circulates

bot_applications.disaster_relief: Rebuilding after Hurricanes, Tornadoes, Floods, Fires
bot_applications.medical: Bringing Doctors to places that need them

ngo_cryptocurrency_vision.existing_example: Bots already find most popular Steemit posts, vote early to earn STEEM

quiz_questions.a: Started OUTSIDE crypto world reaching in, not inside reaching out

quiz_questions.a: POW = Proof of Work (solving math problems), POS = Proof of Stake (coins in wallet mine)
